QuestData.Title: Flight Training: In Due Course
QuestData.Description: Now that you have learned the basics of the race, you should go learn the course.$B$BExplore the spires and collect a race flag from each of the checkpoints.$B$BFly through each checkered flag to collect it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly through 10 Race Flags at the Checkpoints floating above the Mistveil Sea.
